name: Nose Defense
description:
Welcome to your nose!

Nose Defense is a (really short) tower defense game presented in Godot Wild Jam #23. 

Fire your snot cannons to stop viruses from getting inside your body! Viruses come in many forms and behave differently, but trust in your defenses to put up a fight! You can even grow some nose hair to slow your enemies.

Defeat viruses to earn more antibodies so you can strenghten your defenses and face Queenvid, the final boss. 

Good luck and stay safe <3
